name: calibre
content:
calibre noun
(QUALITY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the quality of someone or something, especially someone's ability: If teaching paid more it might attract people of (a) higher calibre. The competition entries were of such (a) high calibre that judging them was very difficult.

calibre noun
(MEASUREMENT)
[ C or U ] the width of the inside of a pipe, especially of the long cylinder-shaped part of a gun, or the width of a bullet
